title: Definition of Mean
text: The mean (also called the average) is formed by adding up all the data points and then divide by the total number of data points.

title: Finding the Total Sum
text: What is the total sum of all the data points?

title: Finding the Total Number of Data Points
text: How many total data points are there? In other words, how many numbers did you sum together in the last part?

title: Calculating Mean from Total Sum and Total Number of Data Points
text: What is the mean? Round to the nearest hundredth place.

subHints.title: Calculating Mean from Total Sum and Total Number of Data Points
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{544}{39}$$ rounded to the nearest hundredth place?
